column4: can someone please help me with fstab to mount a harddrive upon boot?
tell the channel details.. and what specific part you are having issues with.
I edited my fstab as follows http://pastebin.com/m5c363f33 and the drive wont mount upon boot, i refered to forums and the fstab man page not sure what i did wrong
and the one with the issue is the last one? You proberly should tell it a filesystem type and not use 'auto'
ah ok, will do, Thank you very much for the tip
and your line is in the wrong order of arguments
I didn't know until now order was relevant :|
or its missing some parts.. its wrong whatever it is..
ok... ill check it out thanks alot!
you dont even seem to state the filesystem to use.. thats totally wrong. :)
according to the man page "auto" should have determined the ext4 file system
maybe i read the man wrong
you got an 'auto' for auto mounting.. in options.. NOT the filesystem
if its ext4 then tell it ext4  dont rely on auto
thanks for the help ! ill reboot now 2 test
